paper_abstract: We study the entanglement classification under stochastic local operations and classical communication (SLOCC) for odd n-qubit pure states. For this purpose, we introduce the rank with respect to qubit i for an odd n-qubit state. The ranks with respect to qubits 1,2, ... ,n give rise to the classification of the space of odd n qubits into 3(n) families.
paper_title: RANK-BASED SLOCC CLASSIFICATION FOR ODD N QUBITS
